name: Anthony Fryer
title: Engineering Leader, Director, & Manager
about: Experienced Software Engineer and Engineering Leader that fosters teamwork and leadership, researches and learns; resolves ambiguity; motivates others; champions change; uses sound judgment; takes initiative and strives for excellence; wears many hats; achieves goals; acts with integrity; proactively contributes to the success of the business; shows work commitment, and maintains a positive attitude and performance in all situations.
about2: I am actively seeking an opportunity to be a catalyst for a positive impact in people, processes, and products, while collaborating with a talented team and making meaningful contributions to a mission-driven organization.
motto: I am a developer of people, not just products.
